title: PokÃ©mon GO: A Summer of Euphoria and Discontent
text: The 2016 launch of PokÃ©mon GO wasn't just a gaming release; it was a cultural tidal wave. Data shows engagement exploded in July as millions took to the streets, fueled by the novelty of AR and social exploration. However, the mood shifted rapidly in August. The removal of tracking features triggered massive community backlash, proving that while novelty drives adoption, transparency and core mechanics are essential to retaining community trust. The data tracks this sharp emotional pivot from discovery to frustration.
